detail_desc: Short, straight dress in jersey with long sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Chinos in slightly stretchy cotton twill with a regular waist and zip fly. Front pockets, flap back pockets with a button, and gently tapered legs.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset,wide sides and string back.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and ankle-length legs with creases.
Narrow, satin-covered Alice band with a glittery appliqué at the top.
T-shirt in organic slub cotton jersey with an open chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and a gently rounded hem.
Short T-shirt dress in soft viscose jersey.
Set in soft cotton jersey with a dress and leggings. Patterned dress with long sleeves, a gathered seam at the hips and a flared skirt. Unlined. Ribbed leggings with an elasticated waist.
Boxy-style blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, cap sleeves and visible seam down the front.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with pattern-knit stripes, a button placket and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Set with a top and skirt in soft jersey. Short-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Skirt with asymmetric flounces and a glittery elastic waistband.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.

Bodysuit and a pair of leggings in organic cotton. Long-sleeved jersey bodysuit with a narrow frill trim around the neckline and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Ribbed, fine-knit leggings with an elasticated waist and frill at the back.
Short skirt with a soft, felted finish, a high waist, concealed zip in one side and side pockets. Lined.
Short, high-waisted, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a press-stud and concealed zip at one side. Unlined.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Super skinny fit – a shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Short dress in soft modal-blend jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck at the front. Seam at the waist, draped detail on the skirt and a raw-edge hem. Unlined.
Jersey vest top with a motif, chiffon top layer and wrapover back.
Fitted Henley top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a deep neckline, button placket, long sleeves and rounded hem.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Long skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist and high slits in the sides. Short underskirt.
Soft, non-wired, mesh triangle bra with lightly padded cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back and no fasteners.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zipped inner pocket. Polyester filling. Lined.

Thin outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped side pockets, long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Boots in imitation patent leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Jersey linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Top in long-staple cotton with press-studs at the back of the neck, and short sleeves and hem with a seam and flounce.
Sleeveless top in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Short cycling shorts in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Straight-cut blouse in an airy, textured, striped weave with a stand-up collar and opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a deep V-neck with lacing at the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with hard-worn details. Extra-high waist, a button fly and straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with long puff sleeves that are voluminous at the top in a cotton weave and narrow at the bottom in ribbed jersey.
Wedge-heeled sandals with a braided jute trim around the soles, an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and imitation leather insoles. Platform front 2.5 cm. Heel 9 cm.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Cap in cotton twill with an embroidered motif on the front and an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Short dress in an airy cotton weave with a deep V-neck, short sleeves, gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with pockets for breast forms, a zip at the front and straps that are lightly padded for comfort. Racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide, elasticated hem.
V-neck cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with a diagonal zip down the front.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and buttons down the front. Small chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Round-necked jersey T-shirt with a motif.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with buttons at the back, sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs and a decorative tie detail at the hem. Soft brushed inside.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud and tapered legs. Carabiner hook with a braided strap.
Cap with embroidery on the front, a contrasting colour cotton twill peak and concealed elastication at the back. Lined.

Sleeveless dress in sequin-embroidered tulle with concealed press-studs at the back, a seam at the waist, a flared skirt in two layers of tulle and an underskirt with a tulle flounce at the hem. Lined.
Oversized hoodie in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Lined, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cargo shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets and a welt back pocket. Two flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening, one with a decorative zip.
Pyjamas with a vest top in soft jersey and pair of shorts in woven fabric. Top with a V-neck and lace trims at the front. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Hat in braided paper straw with a wide fabric band. Width of brim 8.5 cm.

Fitted ball skirt in sturdy brocade made from recycled polyester containing glittery threads. High, close-fitting waist with pleats for volume and concealed pockets in the side seams. Recycled polyester lining.

Shirt jacket in sturdy denim made from a cotton blend with a collar and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the jacket is recycled.
Wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Satin-covered Alice band with a veil and ears in lace.

Set with a shirt and pair of trousers in a cotton weave. Long-sleeved shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Matching, detachable bow tie. Regular-fit trousers in twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 1.2 cm to 5 cm.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details and patches on the inside of the legs. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a silk blend with a ribbed neckline.
Long-sleeved polo shirt in premium cotton piqué with a collar, button placket and short slits in the sides.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit chenille with a round neckline, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in a cotton weave at the front and jersey cotton at the back. Elasticated waist, decorative buttons at the top, front pockets, a patch back pocket and elasticated hems.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a lace-trimmed stand-up collar and buttons at the top. Pin-tucks with lace insets at the front, an elasticated seam with a decorative drawstring and bow under the bust and a gently draping, flared skirt. Unlined.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.
Skirt in washed stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, heart-shaped front pockets and regular back pockets.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a printed front and round neckline with a narrow trim.
Fitted top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a polo neck and long sleeves.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Scarf in a linen and viscose weave with raw, frayed edges on the short sides.
Top in sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Large hoop earrings in twisted, textured metal.
Cable-knit jumper in soft wool containing some cashmere with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight viscose jersey with a print motif on the front and a rounded hem.
Jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, detachable belt and tapered legs. Front, leg and back pockets.
5-pocket, low-rise shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Canvas backpack with imitation leather details, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a handle and drawstring at the top. Imitation suede flap with a magnetic fastener. Lined. Size 15x29x35 cm.
Long-sleeved, off-the-shoulder top in jersey with a sheen. Tight fit.
